text: The Idaho Freedom Caucus (IDFC) is a libertarian-leaning caucus within the Idaho House of Representatives. Membership is open only to supporters of the Idaho Republican Party platform to join. Founded March 27, 2017, by Mike Kingsley and Bryan Zollinger. ==Issues== In April 2017, the IDFC collaborated to challenge Governor Butch Otter's veto of the Idaho grocery tax. ==Membership== * Mike Kingsley Co Chair * Bryan Zollinger Co Chair * Ron Nate * Heather Scott Others belong but none have said publicly. ==See also== ==External links== * ==References== Category:Idaho Republicans Category:Idaho Legislature Category:Republican Party (United States) organizations Category:Libertarian organizations based in the United States
title: Idaho Freedom Caucus
